name: It Takes Two Advance
description:
Hit mobile game It Takes Two is receiving the update that nobody asked for, for a platform that nobody is playing games on any more. As a complete demake of the original game, enjoy the same crafting action found in the Android and Windows original, in a smaller form factor!

That's right - craft together all of your favourite items, such as Sawblade and Apple, this time on the Gameboy Advance. Feel the raw power of upto 256 colours on-screen at once, with a crisp resolution of 240x160! Phwoaaaarrr!

Key new features include:

* Removed the hints system. Good luck.
